title: Rubik’s Cube of Heavens - Novel Updates
tags: Based on a Movie   Fanfiction   Genius Protagonist   Magic   Male Protagonist   Transmigration
author: Natives Of The Earth   地球本地人
description:
'Magic is magnificent.'

'Magic is mysterious.'

'Magic is a miracle.'

'Magic is also...violent!'

The magnificent burst of splendor in an instant; the mystery in the endless unknown; the miracle in saving too much despair; the violence in...'

Teammate: 'Don't be crooked! The enemy is almost rushing up! Attack!'

'Oh, alright!'

The protagonist hurriedly took a deep breath and then concentrated his breath.

Next moment!

'Waaaagh——'>
